sentence.Network_en: We had no fridge, cooker, cutlery or crockery.

sentence.Network_en: Most of the crockery was still in one piece.
You hang up hurriedly and attend to baby, crockery, etc.

list.abs: ...克氏原灯笼鱼（学名：Protomyctophum crockeri）为辐鳍鱼纲灯笼鱼目灯笼鱼科的其中一种。分布于西北太平洋区，包括日本、鄂霍次克海、白令海等海域，为深海鱼类，栖息深度100-500公尺，体长可达3.7公分。== 参考文献 ==refbegin*.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from obsolete crocker 'potter', from crock

entry.def: Crockery is the plates, cups, saucers, and dishes that you use at meals.

example.ex: We had no fridge, cooker, cutlery or crockery.
example.tran: 我们没有冰箱、炊具、刀具或餐具。

auth_sentence.content: Next up, a sashimi selection presented on beautiful Sixties-style coloured glass crockery.

sentences.en: All the crockery had been smashed to bits.
sentences.cn: 所有的陶器都摔成了碎片。

sentences.en: Most of the crockery was still in one piece.
She bumped against the table and sent the crockery crashing to the ground.
sentences.cn: 她撞在桌子上,使陶器哗啦一声碎落到地上。
